alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys; Kootenai, Cabinet Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 24 at 8:28AM MDT until October 25 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO NOON MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. Rapidly dropping temperatures during the afternoon could produce flash freeze on roads. * WHERE...Highway 2 Kalispell to Libby, Flathead Lake, Highway 37 Eureka to Libby, Highway 56 Bull Lake Road, Flathead Valley, Highway 93 Eureka to Whitefish, Polson, and Mission Valley * WHEN...From noon today to noon MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Flathead, Mission Valleys; Kootenai, Cabinet Region
